word:
You are going to have trials in your churches because there are murmurers and complainers and faultfinders there. Go straight ahead and be 


                                    -311- 

cheerful. And when Brother Irwin and Brother Haskell return to America, they are going to have trials there. Do not let your head be cast down, or feel discouraged, but go forward, firm in Jesus Christ, keeping your eye fixed on the crown of life which Christ, the righteous judge, shall give you in that day.
